item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

im working on a 562 aswell… go to actionsender.java and search your current welcome message… if a defaults not set then search your server name or the log in ip on the welcome screen (127.0.0.0)

hope that helped

item.title: 562 welcome message Help!
item.dc:creator: @ricardoxkill ricardoxkill
item.description:
@ricardoxkill wrote:

look this is mij welcome screen file

sendWindowPane(549, 0);
sendInterface(1, 549, 2, 378);
sendInterface(1, 549, 3, 447);
sendString(“Welcome to Legendz Scape!.”, 378, 113);
sendString(“You are connected from: “+player.getSession().getRemoteAddress(), 378, 114);
sendString(“0”, 378, 39);
sendString(””+player.votes+"", 378, 96);
sendString(“Owners: <img=1>Ricardox, Blackdevil”, 378, 37);
sendString(player.getDisplayName()+", Contact Button Will be Added Soon!", 378, 38);
sendString(“You have “+player.votes+” vote points.”, 378, 94);
sendString(“Voting Site Will Be Added Soon!”, 378, 56);
if(player.donator == 0) {
sendString(“You can be a donator if you helping new players and if you are nice to peoples!.”, 378, 93);
}
if(player.donator == 1) {
sendString(“Thank you for Helping The New Players “+player.getDisplayName()+”, we hope you do it next time Again!”, 378, 93);
}
if(player.GotBankPIN == false) {
sendString(“You do not have a bank pin. Please visit a bank if you would like one.”, 378, 62);
}
if(player.GotBankPIN == true) {
sendString(“You registered a bank pin. People cannot come in your bank now.”, 378, 62);
}

where can i add the Message of the week?? or how to add it in here??

please help its a 562 loading 659

Read full topic
